001package com.technototes.library.logger;
002
003import static java.lang.annotation.ElementType.FIELD;
004import static java.lang.annotation.ElementType.LOCAL_VARIABLE;
005import static java.lang.annotation.ElementType.METHOD;
006
007import java.lang.annotation.Documented;
008import java.lang.annotation.ElementType;
009import java.lang.annotation.Repeatable;
010import java.lang.annotation.Retention;
011import java.lang.annotation.RetentionPolicy;
012import java.lang.annotation.Target;
013
014import com.technototes.library.util.Color;
015
016/** The root annotation for annotation logging, also doubles as a basic string log
017 * @author Alex Stedman
018 */
019@Documented
020@Repeatable(Log.Logs.class)
021@Retention(RetentionPolicy.RUNTIME)
022@Target(value = {FIELD, LOCAL_VARIABLE, METHOD})
023public @interface Log {
024    /** Store index for this annotation (position in telemetry)
025     *
026     * @return The index
027     */
028    int index() default -1;
029
030    /** Store priority for this log entry (to pick the most wanted entry over others with same index)
031     *
032     * @return The priority
033     */
034    int priority() default -1;
035
036    /** Store the name for this annotation to be be beside
037     *
038     * @return The name as a string
039     */
040    String name() default "";
041
042    /** The format for the logged String
043     *
044     * @return The format
045     */
046    String format() default "%s";
047
048    /** The color for the entry
049     *
050     * @return The color
051     */
052    Color entryColor() default Color.NO_COLOR;
053
054    /** The color for the tag for the entry
055     *
056     * @return The color
057     */
058    Color color() default Color.NO_COLOR;
059
060    @Documented
061    @Retention(RetentionPolicy.RUNTIME)
062    @Target({ElementType.FIELD, ElementType.METHOD})
063    @interface Logs {
064        Log[] value();
065    }
066
067    /** Log a number
068     *
069     */
070    @Retention(RetentionPolicy.RUNTIME)
071    @Target(value = {FIELD, LOCAL_VARIABLE, METHOD})
072    @interface Number {
073        /** Store index for this annotation (position in telemetry)
074         *
075         * @return The index
076         */
077        int index() default -1;
078
079        /** Store priority for this log entry (to pick the most wanted entry over others with same index)
080         *
081         * @return The priority
082         */
083        int priority() default -1;
084
085        /** Store the name for this annotation to be be beside
086         *
087         * @return The name as a string
088         */
089        String name() default "";
090        /** The color for the tag for the number
091         *
092         * @return The color
093         */
094        Color color() default Color.NO_COLOR;
095        /** The color for the number
096         *
097         * @return The color
098         */
099        Color numberColor() default Color.NO_COLOR;
100    }
101
102    /** Log a number, but store it as a number bar
103     *
104     */
105    @Retention(RetentionPolicy.RUNTIME)
106    @Target(value = {FIELD, LOCAL_VARIABLE, METHOD})
107    @interface NumberBar {
108        /** Store index for this annotation (position in telemetry)
109         *
110         * @return The index
111         */
112        int index() default -1;
113
114        /** Store priority for this log entry (to pick the most wanted entry over others with same index)
115         *
116         * @return The priority
117         */
118        int priority() default -1;
119
120        /** Store the min for the number bar to scale to
121         *
122         * @return The min
123         */
124        double min() default -1;
125        /** Store the max for the number bar to scale to
126         *
127         * @return The max
128         */
129        double max() default 1;
130        /** Store the scale for the number bar to scale to
131         *
132         * @return The scale
133         */
134        double scale() default 0.1;
135
136        /** Store the name for this annotation to be be beside
137         *
138         * @return The name as a string
139         */
140        String name() default "";
141        /** The color for the tag for the bar
142         *
143         * @return The color
144         */
145        Color color() default Color.NO_COLOR;
146        /** The color for the filled in bar color
147         *
148         * @return The color
149         */
150        Color completeBarColor() default Color.NO_COLOR;
151        /** The color for the not filled in bar color
152         *
153         * @return The color
154         */
155        Color incompleteBarColor() default Color.NO_COLOR;
156        /** The color for the bar outlines
157         *
158         * @return The color
159         */
160        Color outline() default Color.NO_COLOR;
161    }
162
163    @Retention(RetentionPolicy.RUNTIME)
164    @Target(value = {FIELD, LOCAL_VARIABLE, METHOD})
165    @interface NumberSlider {
166        /** Store index for this annotation (position in telemetry)
167         *
168         * @return The index
169         */
170        int index() default -1;
171
172        /** Store priority for this log entry (to pick the most wanted entry over others with same index)
173         *
174         * @return The priority
175         */
176        int priority() default -1;
177
178        /** Store the min for the number bar to scale to
179         *
180         * @return The min
181         */
182        double min() default -1;
183        /** Store the max for the number bar to scale to
184         *
185         * @return The max
186         */
187        double max() default 1;
188        /** Store the scale for the number bar to scale to
189         *
190         * @return The scale
191         */
192        double scale() default 0.1;
193
194        /** Store the name for this annotation to be be beside
195         *
196         * @return The name as a string
197         */
198        String name() default "";
199        /** The color for the tag for the slider
200         *
201         * @return The color
202         */
203        Color color() default Color.NO_COLOR;
204        /** The color for the slider background
205         *
206         * @return The color
207         */
208        Color sliderBackground() default Color.NO_COLOR;
209        /** The color for the slider outline
210         *
211         * @return The color
212         */
213        Color outline() default Color.NO_COLOR;
214        /** The color for the slider slide
215         *
216         * @return The color
217         */
218        Color slider() default Color.NO_COLOR;
219    }
220
221    @Retention(RetentionPolicy.RUNTIME)
222    @Target(value = {FIELD, LOCAL_VARIABLE, METHOD})
223    @interface Boolean {
224        /** Store index for this annotation (position in telemetry)
225         *
226         * @return The index
227         */
228        int index() default -1;
229
230        /** Store priority for this log entry (to pick the most wanted entry over others with same index)
231         *
232         * @return The priority
233         */
234        int priority() default -1;
235
236        /** Store the string when the annotated method returns true
237         *
238         * @return The string
239         */
240        String trueValue() default "true";
241
242        /** The format for when the boolean returns true
243         *
244         * @return The String format
245         */
246        String trueFormat() default "%s";
247        /** The color for the true String
248         *
249         * @return The color
250         */
251        Color trueColor() default Color.NO_COLOR;
252
253        /** Store the string when the annotated method returns false
254         *
255         * @return The string
256         */
257        String falseValue() default "false";
258        /** The format for when the boolean returns false
259         *
260         * @return The String format
261         */
262        String falseFormat() default "%s";
263        /** The color for the false String
264         *
265         * @return The color
266         */
267        Color falseColor() default Color.NO_COLOR;
268
269        /** Store the name for this annotation to be be beside
270         *
271         * @return The name as a string
272         */
273        String name() default "";
274        /** The color for the tag for the boolean
275         *
276         * @return The color
277         */
278        Color color() default Color.NO_COLOR;
279    }
280}
